sandhana jathika layisthuwa thulin parajitha manthriwarun kihipa denek nawatha parlimenthuwata kandawimehi thaman waradak nodakina bawath, parlimenthuwa thula awashyayenma sitiya yuthu kihipa denek elesa nawatha jathika layisthuwa thulin pathkirima janapathiwarayage kalochitha piyawarak lesa thaman wishwasa karana bawa dambaara amila himi pawasayi.“me parajayata pathwunu pirisa aththa washayenma parajayata pathwiya yuthu deshapalagnyayin pirisak neweyi, parajithayan wu pamanin ekama wallata dala thiranaya nokala yuthuyi. ...

rate eekiyabhawaya, bauddha aagamata himi thana, widhayaka janadhipathi dhuraya, palath aandukarawarun sathuwiya yuthu balathala athulu waganthi gananawak sambandhawa ejapaya samanga athi parasparathawayan pilibanda mehidi sakachcha karanu athayi ki ihatha niyojya amathiwaraya, widhayaka janadhipathi dhuraya ahosi kirime waganthiya da athulathwa nawa aandukrama wyawasthawak sampadanaya kirima sandaha janamatha wicharanayakata yamata shrilanipaye siyayata asuwaka pamana pirisak ekangathwaya palakara athayi da kiya.
